unnormalised: NH44, India's longest highway, stretches 3,745 km from Srinagar to Kanyakumari. Did you know it connects 11 states & UTs? Heavy traffic delays are common, esp. near major cities like Delhi & Bangalore, adding ~2-3 hrs to travel time. Planning your route ahead can save time.
normalised: N-H fourty four, India's longest highway, stretches three thousand seven hundred and fourty five kilometer from Srinagar to Kanyakumari. Did you know it connects eleven states and U-T-s? Heavy traffic delays are common, especially near major cities like Delhi and Bangalore, adding approximately two to three hours to travel time. Planning your route ahead can save time.

unnormalised: Road safety is a major concern. In 2022 alone, over 1.5 lakh people died in road accidents across India, according to MoRTH reports. Always wear a seatbelt & follow speed limits. Many state roadways, like Maharashtra State Road Transport Corporation (MSRTC), offer bus services, but schedules can be unreliable; check online beforehand.
normalised: Road safety is a major concern. In two thousand and twenty two alone, over one point five lakh people died in road accidents across India, according to M-o-R-T-H reports. Always wear a seatbelt and follow speed limits. Many state roadways, like Maharashtra State Road Transport Corporation (M-S-R-T-C), offer bus services, but schedules can be unreliable; check online beforehand.
